thread.title: How to Find Out If Your Facebook Data Might Have Been Shared With Cambridge Analytica

author: Katherine Bindley
title: How to Find Out If Your Facebook Data Might Have Been Shared With Cambridge Analytica
text:
It’s time to find out if your Facebook data was improperly shared with Cambridge Analytica. Late Monday, Facebook Inc. said it began posting notices in users’ news feeds to inform them whether they’re among the estimated 87 million people affected. But you don’t have to wait for the notice.
To check if you or your friends logged into “This Is Your Digital Life,” the app that shared information with Cambridge Analytica, click on this Help Center link.
...
